WorkItem.ClosedComment: All done. All relevant changes are in ProtPaladin
WorkItem.Description:
I felt a need to list some necessary changes Prot Paladins that we need to apply to Rawr.Tankadin to keep it in line with Patch 3.1.
 
Talent Changes:
-Remove the bonus from Shields of the Templar, fold damage bonuses into respective spells
-Add support for Exorcism bonus from Sanctity of Battle
-Change from 5 point One-Handed Weapon Specialization to 3 point
-Change from 5 point Ardent Defender to 3 point
Gear Changes:
-Update new value of Haste Rating -> Haste
-Determine and model Tier 8 Bonuses
-Determine and model Ulduar Trinket/Libram Bonuses
-Add options for relevant glyphs
 +Glyph of Divine Plea
 +Glyph of Hammer of the Righteous
 +Glyph of Exorcism
Threat Changes:
-Research and add support to Exorcism to the Threat Model
 
Please, if you feel the need to comment, please limit it to "changes in 3.1 that affect things already in Rawr.Tankadin that Sol might have missed listing" and refrain from "features I wish Rawr.Tankadin had" or "bugs in Rawr.Tankadin" since those will be addressed seperately.

Comments.Message:
-Update new value of Armor Penetration Rating -> Armor Reduction
No need. Already handled in the base classes.
